website_summaries.verdict: Engineered for those hard jobs, yet works great with the fun ones too.
pros: This 3-pronged device contains not just power, but built in temperature protection as well
Reviews suggest the product arrives as expected and holds its charge for high-intensity jobs
Also great for regular household products
cons: Minimal information regarding long term use and effectiveness

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good performance
customer_reviews.text: Gave new life to my old Black and Decker weed trimmer. Had two batteries that were no longer holding their charge long enough to complete the yard (1/2 acre). This replacement battery fits perfectly and, so far, gets me through a couple sessions of trimming on a single recharge (like the originals used to). Good price and good performance.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey c.

customer_reviews.title: Just like new!
customer_reviews.text: We read reviews on Amazon about the replacement battery that were mostly positive before purchasing it. We use the battery to power a pole trimmer. For those unfamiliar with it, it is a trimmer that has a significant extension and the ability to adjust to cut at an angle. We use it on a very large pyracantha that is impossible to trim completely with a conventional trimmer After an initial charge, the battery has worked well, providing as much power as the original battery, if it not slightly more. It fits both the charger and the connection on the trimmer as if it were original. We haven't had it very long, but have been very happy with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this because we wanted to charge several batteries concurrently.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price and allot cheaper than buying it at the stores.
customer_reviews.author: raul villarreal

customer_reviews.title: 10 x Better than Black & Decker
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are much better than Stock Black & Decker.... they last forever. You will not be disappointed with these. Glad I spent money on new batteries
customer_reviews.author: RIchard .old man

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement
customer_reviews.text: A geeat replacement for my B&D NST1118 battery. Nice power and allows me to trim my front and back yards.
customer_reviews.author: RobertoCleveland

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for the black&decker trimmer. Lasts just as long as original, and much more budget friendly. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: An excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised. It has more power and lasts longer between charges than the batteries I have had in the past at far less cost. After one year of use it seems to be as good as ever... much better than the Black and Deckers I have been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: John  Acker

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this item
customer_reviews.text: we purchased this product exactly one year ago and now it won't hold a charge over the level of 2 on a scale of 6 so I believe it's a cheap imitation brand.
customer_reviews.author: jon westergaard

customer_reviews.title: Added new life to my yard tools.
customer_reviews.text: This battery works great, so far, it added new life to my weed Wacker. I was going to upgrade but now I'm going to keep my Black and Decker.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: New life for an old drill!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to purchase a new drillI because I'd heard the batteries were so expensive. Imagine my surprise when I saw how cheap a good replacement battery was! I received my replacement battery early and attached it to my drill. Works like a charm! Only wish they'd included instructions on how long to charge so as to not overcharge the battery .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a charge well
customer_reviews.text: This battery works well; it holds a charge much better than the model that came with the trimmer. And it costs less.
customer_reviews.author: Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Seems to hold a charge better then the factory ones
customer_reviews.text: Seems to hold a charge better then the factory ones, As of now only had it a short time. At this point I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Got super hot.
customer_reviews.text: Got super hot....to the point I think it's dangerous. Threw it in the battery recycling and will purchase the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This stays charged very well. All my old ones ...
customer_reviews.text: This stays charged very well. All my old ones that came with my weed wacker are dead and this one does my modest yard!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Miller

customer_reviews.title: Battery works as expected. Five stars if the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery works as expected. Five stars if the battery last a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Was much more powerful and provided better performance in charging and utilization than the products that I had previously bought at Lowes and Home Depot
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kat

customer_reviews.title: Cordless Battery.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just like the factory one. Have not used it much, yet, we'll see how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Case

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery
customer_reviews.text: This battery does what 2 B&D batteries will do. I've been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: This worked as expected for my weed wacker and that makes it a perfect product
customer_reviews.author: C. st Jean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for bring our old our Black and Decker hedge trimmer back to life!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and just as advertised better then buying a new drill. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Does what was promised
customer_reviews.text: Early review, but battery fit my trimmer no problem and charged up no problem. Time will tell how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my Black and Decker trimmer and blower.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: This battery doesn't have the same power, when fully ...
customer_reviews.text: This battery doesn't have the same power, when fully charged, as the OEM battery that came with the Black & Decker vacuum. It also doesn't run as long as the original battery.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for Black and Decker battery! Charged up fast, fit perfectly! Delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Batteries last
customer_reviews.text: Own 3 Poweraxis batteries, replacing all the old Black & Decker batteries. Very pleased much longer life.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Fully charge before first use
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly for what I bought it for. It fit my weed eater and it worked right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it still works fine ☺
customer_reviews.text: It only has two prongs instead of three, but it still works fine ☺
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement for original battery. Fit good, recharged with original charger.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brummage
